mapper.select: SELECT title,content FROM boards WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT b.id,b.title,u.username FROM boards b INNER JOIN users u ON b.usersId=u.id ORDER BY b.id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 3 ROWS ONLY

SELECT totalCount, totalPage, currentPage, decode(currentPage,0,1,0) first, decode(currentPage, totalPage-1, 1, 0) last FROM ( SELECT count(*) totalCount, ceil(count(*)/3) totalPage, #{page} currentPage, 0 first, 0 last FROM boards )
